item.title: Reinforcement Learning with Euclidean Data Augmentation for State-Based Continuous Control
item.description: Boosting RL data efficiency for continuous control, this paper advocates Euclidean data augmentation using limb-based state features, significantly improving performance across various tasks.

item.title: Towards Effective Planning Strategies for Dynamic Opinion Networks
item.description: This study introduces novel, scalable AI-based planning strategies for controlling misinformation spread in dynamic opinion networks, significantly improving infection rate control.
